files.name: Gladys the Corgi - A Custom Dog Follower Mod 1.0.0
Gladys the Corgi - A Custom Dog Follower Mod
files.file_name: Gladys the Corgi - A Custom Dog Follower Mod-50164-1-0-1-1622688043.zip
files.changelog_html:
Fixed issue where Gladys would be summoned whenever the player cast *any* spell.
When equipping George your left hand will now be lowered.
Added Immersive Interactions support out-of-the-box.
files.content_preview_link: https://file-metadata.nexusmods.com/file/nexus-files-s3-meta/1704/50164/Gladys the Corgi - A Custom Dog Follower Mod-50164-1-0-1-1622688043.zip.json

files.name: Gladys the Corgi - A Custom Dog Follower Mod
files.file_name: Gladys the Corgi - A Custom Dog Follower Mod-50164-1-0-2-1622767031.zip
files.changelog_html:
Fixed minor bug where Gladys sometimes wouldn't drop George in front of the player after fetching.
Reformatted dialogue to prevent the (albeit unlikely) scenario where you pay for Gladys but do not do not receive ownership of her and need to purchase her again.
